trans-unit.source: On your Mac, visit the [Azure Portal].
trans-unit.target: On your Mac, visit the [Azure Portal].

trans-unit.source: Click Browse All > Mobile Apps > the backend that you just created.
trans-unit.target: Click Browse All > Mobile Apps > the backend that you just created.

trans-unit.source: In the mobile app settings, click Quickstart > iOS (Objective-C).
trans-unit.target: In the mobile app settings, click Quickstart > iOS (Objective-C).

trans-unit.source: If you prefer Swift, click Quickstart > iOS (Swift) instead.
trans-unit.target: If you prefer Swift, click Quickstart > iOS (Swift) instead.

trans-unit.source: Under Download and run your iOS project, click Download.
trans-unit.target: Under Download and run your iOS project, click Download.

trans-unit.source: This downloads a complete Xcode project for an app pre-configured to connect to your backend.
trans-unit.target: This downloads a complete Xcode project for an app pre-configured to connect to your backend.

trans-unit.source: Press the Run button to build the project and start the app in the iOS simulator.
trans-unit.target: Press the Run button to build the project and start the app in the iOS simulator.

trans-unit.source: In the app, type meaningful text, such as _Complete the tutorial_ and then click the plus (+) icon.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type meaningful text, such as _Complete the tutorial_ and then click the plus (+) icon.

trans-unit.source: This sends a POST request to the Azure backend you deployed earlier.
trans-unit.target: This sends a POST request to the Azure backend you deployed earlier.

trans-unit.source: The backend inserts data from the request is into the TodoItem SQL table, and returns information about the newly stored items back to the mobile app.
trans-unit.target: The backend inserts data from the request is into the TodoItem SQL table, and returns information about the newly stored items back to the mobile app.

trans-unit.source: The mobile app displays this data in the list.
trans-unit.target: The mobile app displays this data in the list.
